summary: A classic horror from Edgar Allan Poe brought to life through the eyes of Horror Master Ulli Lommel!
cast: Jillian Swanson|Jack Quinn|Victoria Ullmann|Michelle Guest|Sharon Senina|Tisha Franklin|Joella Mabusa|Willis Russell|Trista Beard|Olivia Parrish|Jacquelyn Aurora|Michael Barbour|Carsten Frank|Nola Roeper|Gunter Ziegler|Calum Waddell|Laura Hofrichter|Rob Walsh|Ernest Borneo|Jeff Frentzen|Nicole Cooke|Ulli Lommel|Janelle Dote|Elissa Dowling
title: El cuervo (The Raven)
